entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle changing to periods of snow this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
